Rule.Name: Enable Client Certificate Authentication for HTTPS (Manual)
Rule.Section: Enable Client Certificate Authentication for HTTPS
Rule.NonCompliantComment: Client-cert authentication is not enabled for sensitive connectors, which may expose the server to unauthorized access.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Setup client-cert authentication for secure connectors.

Rule.Name: Enable SSLEnabled attribute for HTTPS Connectors (Automated)
Rule.NonCompliantComment: The SSLEnabled attribute is not set to 'true' for sensitive connectors, which may allow unencrypted communications.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Ensure SSLEnabled is set to 'true' for sensitive connectors.

Rule.Name: Set scheme attribute to HTTPS for secure connectors (Automated)
Rule.NonCompliantComment: The scheme attribute for connectors is not set accurately, which may lead to insecure configurations.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Ensure the scheme is set accurately (e.g., "https" for secure connectors).
Rule.Correction: grep -q 'scheme=' $CATALINA_HOME/conf/server.xml && sed -i 's|scheme="[^"]*"|scheme="https"|' $CATALINA_HOME/conf/server.xml || sed -i '/<Connector/ s|<Connector|<Connector scheme="https"|' $CATALINA_HOME/conf/server.xml; systemctl restart tomcat10

Rule.Name: Set secure attribute to true for SSL-enabled connectors (Automated)
Rule.Section: Set secure attribute to true for SSL-enabled connectors
Rule.NonCompliantComment: The secure attribute is not set correctly, which may expose the server to insecure communications.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Ensure the secure attribute is set to true only for SSL-enabled connectors.
Rule.Correction: grep -q 'secure=' $CATALINA_HOME/conf/server.xml && sed -i 's|secure="[^"]*"|secure="true"|' $CATALINA_HOME/conf/server.xml || sed -i '/<Connector/ s|<Connector|<Connector secure="true"|' $CATALINA_HOME/conf/server.xml; systemctl restart tomcat10

Rule.Name: Use Strong SSL Protocols (Automated)
Rule.NonCompliantComment: The 'sslProtocol' attribute is not configured correctly for secure connectors, which may allow weak SSL/TLS protocols.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Ensure 'sslProtocol' is configured correctly for secure connectors.
Rule.Correction: grep -q 'sslProtocol=' $CATALINA_HOME/conf/server.xml && sed -i 's|sslProtocol="[^"]*"|sslProtocol="TLSv1.2"|' $CATALINA_HOME/conf/server.xml || sed -i '/<Connector/ s|<Connector|<Connector sslProtocol="TLSv1.2"|' $CATALINA_HOME/conf/server.xml; systemctl restart tomcat10
